short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpsBerry Chrome extension lets you create and instantly share step-by-step guides with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert any task into step-by-step guides in one click. Share that content in an instant with a link.

With OpsBerry you can convert any task into a step-by-step guide and instantly get a link to share with anyone. Itâ€™s the fastest and easiest way to turn any task or tribal knowledge into actionable step-by-step instructions to share with your team. Whether you want to break something down into steps, troubleshooting an obscure problem, building a manual for your household, providing instructions for your classroom or simply building how-go guides for your favorite hobbies, OpsBerry makes it simple to share knowledge of any kind that anyone can use with AI generated how-to guides.
